thread.title: Go Loco Mexican Restaurant Signs up for Spillover's Premium Internet Marketing Services to Enhance Its Website Design, Email Marketing, Social Media Branding and More
thread.title_full: Go Loco Mexican Restaurant Signs up for Spillover's Premium Internet Marketing Services to Enhance Its Website Design, Email Marketing, Social Media Branding and More

title: Go Loco Mexican Restaurant Signs up for Spillover's Premium Internet Marketing Services to Enhance Its Website Design, Email Marketing, Social Media Branding and More
text:
SOURCE: Distinct Software Solutions July 29, 2015 10:22 ET Go Loco Mexican Restaurant Signs up for Spillover's Premium Internet Marketing Services to Enhance Its Website Design, Email Marketing, Social Media Branding and More 
AUSTIN, TX --(Marketwired - July 29, 2015) - Distinct Software Solutions announced today that Go Loco, a fast food taco chain located in the Dallas-Fort Worth area, has signed up for its internet marketing, email marketing and social media management to enhance branding across all online platforms. These services will be implemented by Spillover, a leading online provider of restaurant marketing and one of Distinct Software Solutions' key brands. 
"We're beyond excited to bring Spillover's premium services to Go Loco," said Boots Crossley, executive vice president of sales with Distinct Software Solutions. "Go Loco serves fantastic food with a fun aesthetic. Spillover will provide Go Loco with full online marketing solutions, including responsive web site design, unlimited email marketing, and online reputation management. We are pleased to help Go Loco grow." 
Spillover is one of the restaurant industry's most effective means of enhancing internet marketing. Spillover's innovative tools include fully-responsive websites designed to fit all devices, unlimited email marketing with data collection, and reputation management to improve social media reviews and entice new followers. These tools will assist Go Loco with reaching new customers, generating increased revenue, and joining online conversations to influence what past customers are saying and potential customers are reading. Go Loco will get a dedicated social media expert, who will recognize, manage and respond to comments on multiple platforms, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Yelp, Google+, and more. 
Go Loco currently includes five locations through the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, with more opening soon. Go Loco's food is distinctive for its authentic approach to Mexican cuisine. Go Loco uses high quality ingredients with no additives or preservatives, and its menu includes street tacos, salads, nachos and more, all individually prepared to order and topped with flavorful salsa. 
Distinct Software Solutions is an Austin-based company dedicated to bringing comprehensive digital marketing to an increasingly wide range of industries. Spillover, one of Distinct Software Solutions' brands, is an innovative provider of restaurant marketing solutions. 
Visit Spillover on the web at www.spillover.com . 
Visit Go Loco on the web at http://www.goloco.com/ . 
For more information contact CourseTrends at 512-236-0060. Contact Information
